verses.verse: תְּפִלָּה֮ <S%H8605><s%> A Prayer לְמֹשֶׁ֪ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲ‍ֽדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> Lord מָע֣וֹן <S%H4583><s%> thou hast been our dwelling place אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> You הָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been לָּ֗נוּ בְּדֹ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> in all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

בְּטֶ֤רֶם ׀ <S%H2962><s%> Before הָ֘רִ֤ים <S%H2022><s%> Before the mountains יֻלָּ֗דוּ <S%H3205><s%> were brought forth וַתְּח֣וֹלֵֽל <S%H2342><s%> or ever thou hadst formed אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְתֵבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> and the world וּֽמֵעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> even from everlasting עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> everlasting אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> thou [art] God

תָּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> Thou turnest אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> into דַּכָּ֑א <S%H1793><s%> to destruction וַ֝תֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and sayest שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Return בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ye children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when אֶ֪לֶף <S%H505><s%> For a thousand שָׁנִ֡ים <S%H8141><s%> years בְּֽעֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight כְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [are but] as אֶ֭תְמוֹל <S%H865><s%> yesterday כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when יַעֲבֹ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> when it is past וְאַשְׁמוּרָ֥ה <S%H821><s%> and [as] a watch בַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> in the night

זְ֭רַמְתָּם <S%H2229><s%> Thou carriest them away as with a flood שֵׁנָ֣ה <S%H8142><s%> they are [as] a sleep יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> fall בַּ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning כֶּחָצִ֥יר <S%H2682><s%> [they are] like grass יַחֲלֹֽף׃ <S%H2498><s%> [which] groweth up

בַּ֭בֹּקֶר <S%H1242><s%> In the morning יָצִ֣יץ <S%H6692><s%> it flourisheth וְחָלָ֑ף <S%H2498><s%> and groweth up לָ֝עֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> in the evening יְמוֹלֵ֥ל <S%H4135><s%> it is cut down וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> and withereth
כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָלִ֥ינוּ <S%H3615><s%> For we are consumed בְאַפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H639><s%> by thine anger וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ <S%H2534><s%> and by thy wrath נִבְהָֽלְנוּ׃ <S%H926><s%> are we troubled

[שַׁתָּ כ] (שַׁתָּ֣ה <S%H7896><s%> apply ק) עֲוֹנֹתֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> our iniquities לְנֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5048><s%> before עֲ֝לֻמֵ֗נוּ <S%H5956><s%> before thee our secret לִמְא֥וֹר <S%H3974><s%> [sins] in the light פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> of thy countenance

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יָ֭מֵינוּ <S%H3117><s%> For all our days פָּנ֣וּ <S%H6437><s%> are passed away בְעֶבְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5678><s%> in thy wrath כִּלִּ֖ינוּ <S%H3615><s%> we spend שָׁנֵ֣ינוּ <S%H8141><s%> our years כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like הֶֽגֶה׃ <S%H1899><s%> as a tale

יְמֵֽי־ <S%H3117><s%> The days שְׁנוֹתֵ֨ינוּ <S%H8141><s%> of our years בָהֶ֥ם שִׁבְעִ֪ים <S%H7657><s%> and ten שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְאִ֤ם <S%H518><s%> if בִּגְבוּרֹ֨ת ׀ <S%H1369><s%> and if by reason of strength שְׁמ֘וֹנִ֤ים <S%H8084><s%> [they be] fourscore שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְ֭רָהְבָּם <S%H7296><s%> yet [is] their strength עָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> labour וָאָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> and sorrow כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָ֥ז <S%H1468><s%> cut off חִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H2440><s%> for it is soon וַנָּעֻֽפָה׃ <S%H5774><s%> and we fly away

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who י֭וֹדֵעַ <S%H3045><s%> Who knoweth עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> the power אַפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H639><s%> of your anger וּ֝כְיִרְאָתְךָ֗ <S%H3374><s%> to the fear עֶבְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5678><s%> [so is] thy wrath

לִמְנ֣וֹת <S%H4487><s%> [us] to number יָ֭מֵינוּ <S%H3117><s%> our days כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So הוֹדַ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> So teach וְ֝נָבִ֗א <S%H935><s%> that we may apply לְבַ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> [our] hearts חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> unto wisdom

שׁוּבָ֣ה <S%H7725><s%> Return יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתָ֑י <S%H4970><s%> how וְ֝הִנָּחֵ֗ם <S%H5162><s%> how long? and let it repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> thee concerning thy servants

שַׂבְּעֵ֣נוּ <S%H7646><s%> O satisfy בַבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> us early חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> with thy mercy וּֽנְרַנְּנָ֥ה <S%H7442><s%> that we may rejoice וְ֝נִשְׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8055><s%> and be glad בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָמֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H3117><s%> all our days

שַׂ֭מְּחֵנוּ <S%H8055><s%> Make us glad כִּימ֣וֹת <S%H3117><s%> according to the days עִנִּיתָ֑נוּ <S%H6031><s%> [wherein] thou hast afflicted שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <S%H8141><s%> us [and] the years רָאִ֥ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> [wherein] we have seen רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

יֵרָאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> appear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants פָעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> Let thy work וַ֝הֲדָרְךָ֗ <S%H1926><s%> and thy glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto בְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> unto their children

וִיהִ֤י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> Let נֹ֤עַם <S%H5278><s%> And let the beauty אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God עָ֫לֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> thou the work יָ֭דֵינוּ <S%H3027><s%> of our hands כּוֹנְנָ֥ה <S%H3559><s%> be upon us and establish עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> upon us yea the work יָ֝דֵ֗ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> of our hands כּוֹנְנֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> establish
